page.title: 06LUCY OLSEN'S DAY.
page.content: My name is{Lucy Olsen.}I am eight and a half years old. I go to{Thoresby} {Primary School.}I live in{Kingston } {upon Hull}and my county is called Humberside. We start this school in the nursery at three and a half years old and we leave when we are nine. We start at nine o'clock and go home at half past three. We do sums and writing and sometimes our class has the computer. On Wednesday evenings I go to the {Brownies.}We wear a brown dress, a yellow tie, a brown belt and a hat. We play games and do fun work. When I am ten I will be a{Girl Guide.}On Sunday we go to Church Parade.
